Length-based model (SS3; ICES, 2018) that uses landings and some discards. Additional discards are then included to calculate a catch forecast

Commercial landings; four survey indices (FR-EVHOE-WIBTS-Q4, SP-PORC-WIBTS-Q3, IE-IGFS-WIBTS-Q4, and RESSGASC); maturity data: constant maturity (Martin, 1991); natural mortality: constant value of 0.4.

Data series from most fleets are available; 75% of the observed discards are included in the assessment (ICES, 2017b, 2018). The discards not included in the assessment are used to top-up the catch advice.
Working Group for the Bay of Biscay and the Iberian Waters Ecoregion (WGBIE)
